class="row big"><div class="col-sm-6 col-xs-12"><img alt="Private" src="/static/media/third.b865bafc.png"/></div><div class="col-sm-6 col-xs-12"><h1>Private</h1><h3 class="desc">SUMOKOIN is created with a <span>high level of privacy</span> in mind, setting Ring <span>Confidential Transactions</span> (RingCT) with minimum ringsize of 49 (48 mixings) to conceal sources/amounts transferred and make it high resistance to blockchain analysis</h3></div></div></div><div class="page-container container-fluid fourth"><div class="row big"><div class="col-sm-6 col-xs-12"><h1>Untraceable</h1><h3 class="desc">SUMOKOIN is untraceable; sending and receiving addresses are, <span>encrypted</span> transacted amounts are obfuscated by default. Transactions on the SUMOKOIN blockchain cannot be linked to a particular user or real-world identity.</h3></div><div class="col-sm-6 col-xs-12 first-xs img-right"><img alt="Untraceable" src="/static/media/fourth.31688566.png"/></div></div></div><div class="page-container container-fluid fifth"><div class="row big"><div class="col-sm-6 col-xs-12"><img alt="Decentralized" src="/static/media/fifth.54e70766.png"/></div><div class="col-sm-6 col-xs-12"><h1>Decentralized</h1><h3 class="desc">SUMOKOIN follows Satoshi Nakamoto\'s vision of decentralized, trustless cryptocurrency, i.e. a <span>secure digital cash</span> operated by a network of users. Transactions are confirmed by distributed consensus, and then recorded on the blockchain immutably. Third-parties do not need to be trusted to keep your SUMOKOIN safe.</h3></div></div></div><div class="page-container container-fluid sixth"><div class="row big"><div class="col-sm-6 col-xs-12"><h1>Fungible</h1><h3 class="desc">SUMOKOIN is truly fungible, thanks to built-in privacy features. Just like cash, all SUMOKOIN are <span>equal, changeable.</span> It is extremely unlikely that coin will ever be blacklisted by any party due to its association in previous transactions.</h3></div><div class="col-sm-6 col-xs-12 first-xs img-right"><img alt="Fungible" src="/static/media/sixth.43e7e0b5.png"/></div></div></div><div class="page-container container-fluid
